This article is about the Hunter area. For other uses, see Piscatoris.
Piscatoris Hunter area

Eagles' Peak (mountain)

The Piscatoris Woodland was one of three completely new areas opened up with the Hunter update. It is used as a main Hunter area for levels 3 to 69+. It can be found south of Piscatoris Fishing Colony, west of Tree Gnome Stronghold and just north of the Eagles' Peak. You can use the fairy ring code AKQ. Several types of hunting can be done here:

Contents

  • 1 Getting there
  • 2 Hunter creatures
    • 2.1 Falconry
  • 3 Monsters
  • 4 Personalities
  • 5 Music
  • 6 Changes

Getting there[edit | edit source]

  • Teleport there by using a Piscatoris teleport scroll.
  • Players can use the fairy ring code AKQ to get to this area.
  • Alternatively, run north-west from Tree Gnome Stronghold or Ardougne, and take the boat by talking to Kathy Corkat, who is located at the transportation icon just east of the Eagles' Peak at a cost of 50 coins. She will bring the player to the entrance of Piscatoris Fishing Colony.
  • Western Banner 4 will teleport the player outside of the bank.

Hunter creatures[edit | edit source]

The following Hunter creatures are found in this area:

Level Creature Technique
3 Common kebbit Tracking
9 Copper longtail Bird snare
15 Ruby harvest Butterfly net and jar
23 Wild kebbit Deadfall
27 Ferret Box trap
27 White rabbit Rabbit snare
37 Prickly kebbit Deadfall
49 Razor-backed kebbit Tracking
53 Chinchompa Box trap

Falconry[edit | edit source]

Main article: Piscatoris falconry area

The Piscatoris Hunter area also contains the Piscatoris falconry area, where the following creatures may be caught using falcons:

Level Creature Technique
43 Spotted kebbit Falconry
57 Dark kebbit Falconry
69 Dashing kebbit Falconry

Monsters[edit | edit source]

This area doesn't contain any attackable monsters that will pose a threat to the player.

Personalities[edit | edit source]

  • Matthias is found in the falconry enclosure.

Music[edit | edit source]

Name Unlock details Music track
Joy of the Hunt Unlocked at the Feldip Hunter area
On the Wing Unlocked in the Piscatoris Hunter area, near the Falconer

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 November 2006
(update)

The area was made accessible to players.

2 May 2006
(update)

The area was first added ingame with the Swan Song quest, but an invisible barrier prevented players from walking south.

v • d • e

The '''Piscatoris Woodland''' was one of three completely new areas opened up with the [[Hunter]] update. It is used as a main [[Hunter]] area for levels 3 to 69+. It can be found south of [[Piscatoris Fishing Colony]], west of [[Tree Gnome Stronghold]] and just north of the [[Eagles' Peak (mountain)|Eagles' Peak]]. You can use the [[fairy ring]] code {{Fairycode|AKQ}}. Several types of hunting can be done here:

==Getting there==
*Teleport there by using a [[Piscatoris teleport|Piscatoris]] [[Teleport scrolls|teleport scroll]].
*Players can use the [[fairy ring]] code {{Fairycode|AKQ}} to get to this area.
*Alternatively, run north-west from Tree Gnome Stronghold or [[Ardougne]], and take the boat by talking to [[Kathy Corkat]], who is located at the transportation icon just east of the [[Eagles' Peak (mountain)|Eagles' Peak]] at a cost of 50 [[coins]]. She will bring the player to the entrance of Piscatoris Fishing Colony.
*Western Banner 4 will teleport the player outside of the bank.

==Hunter creatures==
The following [[Hunter]] creatures are found in this area:

|}

===Falconry===
{{main|Piscatoris falconry area}}

|}

==Monsters==
This area doesn't contain any attackable monsters that will pose a threat to the player.

==Personalities==
*[[Matthias]] is found in the falconry enclosure.
